name: Kartographer
description: Build tools for the Kartographer-MediaWiki extension.

scripts.build-lib: node_modules/.bin/browserify lib/mapbox/mapbox-main.js -o lib/mapbox/mapbox-lib.js && cp -rv node_modules/mapbox.js/theme/* lib/mapbox/ && rm lib/mapbox/images/render.sh && cp -v node_modules/leaflet-sleep/Leaflet.Sleep.js lib/leaflet.sleep.js
